data.name: Movavi Video Editor 15 Plus - Family Set
data.detailed_description:
Share your memories and special feelings with the whole family and make emotionally charged videos with the help of these themed packs:

  • Family celebrations
  • Kids’ festivities
  • Love stories
  • Sweet home

Create heart-warming videos for your relatives to share the family’s most precious moments: birthdays, weddings, graduations, and other one-off events. Festive backgrounds and uplifting music – that’s what you need! Design a romantic gift for your other half: surprise them with a love story video! Tender stickers and titles will help you set the mood.

With this set, you get:

  • 61 titles
  • 33 transitions
  • 39 stickers
  • 16 backgrounds
  • 20 music samples

The set is compatible with Movavi Video Editor Plus

data.short_description: Share your memories and special feelings with the whole family and make emotionally charged videos with the help of these themed packs:
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
